sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, Fragment, useRef } from "react"; import { MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBCardImage, MDBCardTitle, MDBCardText, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBContainer, MDBBtn, MDBModal, MDBCardGroup, MDBInput, MDBIcon, MDBModalBody, MDBModalHeader, MDBModalFooter, MDBCloseIcon } from "mdbreact"; import Style from "../css/CardStyle.module.css"; import '../css/CardsD.css' import { db } from '../index' const EventsCreator = (state) => { // const { eventsArr } = state; const [modalIsOpen, setModalIsOpen] = useState(false); const [register, setRegister] = useState(false) const [data, setdata] = useState({ name: '', lastName: '', phoneNumber: '', email: '', address: '', school: '', curriculum: '', why: '', expectaions: '', vehicle: '', tremp: '', availbleSeats: '0' }) const [errData, seterrData] = useState({ errName: 'חובה להזין שם', errLastName: 'חובה להזין שם משפחה', errPhoneNumber: 'חובה להזין מספר טלפון', errEmail: 'חובה להזין כתובת אימייל', errExpectaions: 'חובה להזין ציפיות למסע' }) const imageRef = useRef(null); const titleRef = useRef(null); const desRef = useRef(null); const dateRef = useRef(null); const sendInfoHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault() if (!event.target.classList.contains('was-validated')) event.target.classList.add('was-validated') if (event.target.checkValidity()) { db.collection(`${titleRef}`).doc(`${data.name, data.lastName}`).set(data).then('בקשת הרשמה התקבלה למערכת') setRegister(false) } } function CreateCard(item) { titleRef.current = item.title; desRef.current = item.fullDesc; dateRef.current = item.date; imageRef.current = item.imageUrl; setModalIsOpen(true); } function SignModal(title) { setModalIsOpen(false) setRegister(true) } const cards = state.eventsArr.map((item, index) => { return ( {item.title}
{item.description} CreateCard(item)} > קרא/י עוד ); }); return ( {cards} setModalIsOpen(false)} style={{ overlay: { backgroundColor: "rgba(0,0,0,0.4)", }, }} > {titleRef.current}
{dateRef.current}
{desRef.current} SignModal(titleRef.current)} > הירשם setRegister(false)} style={{ overlay: { backgroundColor: "rgba(0,0,0,0.4)", }, }} >

הרשמה למסע

{titleRef.current}

{dateRef.current}

setdata({ ...data, name: e })} >
{errData.errName}
 setdata({ ...data, lastName: e })} >
{errData.errLastName}
 setdata({ ...data, phoneNumber: e })} >
{errData.errPhoneNumber}
 setdata({ ...data, email: e })} >
{errData.errEmail}
 setdata({ ...data, address: e })} > setdata({ ...data, school: e })} > setdata({ ...data, curriculum: e })} > setdata({ ...data, why: e })} > setdata({ ...data, expectaions: e })} >
{errData.errExpectaions}
setdata({ ...data, vehicle: 'כן' })} />
setdata({ ...data, tremp: 'כן' })} />
שלח setRegister(false)} outline color="danger"> ביטול
) }; export default EventsCreator;
